item.title: Add domcloud.co to list of free PaaS service
item.description: https://domcloud.co - Linux hosting service that also provides CI/CD with GitHub, SSH and MariaDB/Postgres database. Free version has 1 GB storage and 1 GB network/month limit and limited to a free domain.

item.title: adding Einblick
item.description: https://www.einblick.ai/) - a modern data science platform that brings Python notebooks to a collaborative canvas and includes tools that automate common tasks such as building predictive models (AutoML - a modern data science platform that brings Python notebooks to a collaborative canvas and includes tools that automate common tasks such as building predictive models (AutoML) or comparing populations. Free tier includes 5 canvases and unlimited collaborators.
